books.title: WaniKani
books.author: Heinrich Böll
books.blurb: WaniKani is an online tool designed to help learners master over 2,000 kanji and 6,000 vocabulary words using a spaced repetition system. It focuses on efficient memorization through mnemonic aids and timed reviews that reinforce long-term retention. Best suited for learners who want to build strong reading skills, WaniKani is a powerful supplement to any Japanese study routine.

books.title: Genki
books.author: Annie Proulx
books.blurb: Genki, An Integrated Course in Elementary Japanese, is a highly recommended textbook for beginners learning Japanese. It offers a clear, structured approach with engaging dialogues, grammar explanations, and practice exercises that build foundational skills. Ideal for both classroom and self-study, it also incorporates cultural context to enhance language learning.

books.title: Anki
books.author: Leonora Carrington
books.blurb: Anki is a customizable flashcard app that uses spaced repetition to help learners efficiently memorize and retain information, including Japanese vocabulary, kanji, and grammar. Its flexibility allows users to download pre-made decks or create their own tailored to specific learning goals. Anki is especially popular among serious language learners for its effectiveness in long-term retention and daily review.

description.value: Matt Martinez started his career in 1923 at the age of six selling tamales from a wooden pushcart by the Texas Capitol.

Matt & Janie opened El Rancho in 1952 on East 1st Street in downtown Austin with no employees and seating for 40.   Matt worked the front of the house and Janie made everything from scratch in the kitchen.

Today the South Lamar restaurant seats more than 500.  El Rancho still makes everything from scratch.  Our in house tortilla factory grinds Non-GMO corn daily to make the freshest corn tortillas and chips you can find.   Our famous Margarita’s are made with fresh squeezed lime juice.

This is the second paragraph of the text to show how to loop over the text.
